description: In a bold move that could reshape the AI landscape in China, Kai-Fu Lee, the visionary behind ‘AI Superpowers,’ has launched 01.AI with the ambitious goal of pioneering a large language model (LLM) tailored specifically for the Chinese market. This endeavor positions 01.AI in direct competition with other major players in the country’s tech innovation ... Read more
